DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy and safety of Omacor® 4g with statin treatment for lowering TG levels in subjects with type 2 Diabetes combined with hyperlipidemia
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Prescription Omega-3 Fatty Acid Added to Stable Statin Therapy in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes and Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.criteria: LDLC < 100mg/dL, TG > 150mg/dL, patients on statin treatment for at least 6 weeks prior to randomization. Type 2 Diabetes HbA1c ≤ 10.0 Type 1 Diabetes Patients with PPAR gamma agonist therapy Patients with acute MI, Unstable angina within 6 months History of malignant tumor within 2 years Women with pregnant, breastfeeding
